title: Email/Password Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login screen.
Enter a valid registered email address.
Enter the corresponding valid password.
Tap the login button.
Verify that the user is authenticated and routed to the Home Dashboard within 2 seconds.

title: Email/Password Authentication Failure
description: Verify that login fails with invalid email or password and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login screen.
Enter an invalid or unregistered email address.
Enter an incorrect password.
Tap the login button.
Verify that login fails and an informative error message is displayed.

title: Google Sign-In Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can sign in successfully using Google Sign-In and is routed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the login screen.
Tap on the Google Sign-In button.
Complete the Google authentication flow with valid account.
Verify user is authenticated via Google and routed to Home Dashboard within 2 seconds.

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify password recovery process sends reset email and displays confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the login screen.
Tap the 'Forgot Password' link.
Enter a registered email address.
Submit password recovery request.
Verify confirmation message that reset email was sent is displayed.

title: Create New Invoice with Valid Data
description: Verify that users can create a new invoice, save it as draft, and see it in the list.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the invoice creation screen.
Fill out all required fields with valid data.
Save the invoice as a draft.
Verify the draft invoice appears in the invoice list with correct status.

title: Invoice Lifecycle State Transition Validations
description: Verify invoice status changes across Draft, Posted, Paid, and Cancelled states with business rules enforced.

steps.description: Create a draft invoice with valid stock items.
Post the invoice, triggering stock validation and automatic inventory update.
Verify invoice status updated to Posted and inventory stock decreased accordingly.
Mark the Posted invoice as Paid.
Verify invoice status updated to Paid and payment tracking updated.
Attempt to cancel a Paid invoice and check if business rules permit cancellation or deny.
Verify correct enforcement of cancellation rules and audit trail entry created.

title: Invoice Posting with Insufficient Inventory
description: Verify that posting an invoice with item quantities exceeding available stock is prevented with an error.

steps.description: Create a draft invoice containing items with quantities greater than current inventory.
Attempt to post the invoice.
Verify posting is blocked and user is notified of insufficient stock.

title: Inventory Stock Update After Invoice Posting
description: Verify that inventory stock levels update in real-time after invoice posting and audit trail records the movement.

steps.description: Post an invoice that reduces the quantity of inventory items.
Verify inventory stock is decreased correctly and stock movement audit trail is created.
View the inventory detail screen for affected items.
Verify updated stock quantities and recent movements are displayed accurately.

title: Low Stock Alert Notification
description: Verify that a local notification is triggered when inventory for an item reaches its reorder threshold.

steps.description: Post invoices reducing inventory stock below reorder point.
Verify that a local notification alert for low stock is received.

title: Customer Profile Real-Time Update and Phone Lookup
description: Verify that changes to customer profiles and purchase history appear in real-time and phone-based lookup returns correct results.

steps.description: Modify a customer's profile or purchase data in Firestore.
Verify the app reflects updates in customer profile and analytics dashboards immediately.
Search customer list using a valid phone number.
Verify the correct customer profile is retrieved and displayed.

title: Analytics Dashboard KPI and Chart Rendering
description: Verify KPIs and interactive charts load within 3 seconds and reflect real-time data accurately for all analytics cards.

steps.description: Navigate to the Analytics section from Home Dashboard.
Verify the 7 KPI cards and charts are rendered fully within 3 seconds.
Modify underlying data such as invoices or payments that impact KPIs.
Confirm that analytics updates with real-time changes without delay or inconsistency.
Use date range selectors to filter analytics data.
Verify charts and KPIs refresh properly according to selected ranges.

title: Cross-Platform UI Responsiveness
description: Verify the app UI maintains proper layout, color scheme, and minimum touch targets across Android, iOS, and Web platforms.

steps.description: Launch the app on Android, iOS, and Web environments.
Verify that Material 3 design with navy and sage palette is consistent.
Verify all interactive elements meet minimum touch target sizes.
Verify layouts adapt properly on different screen sizes and orientations.

title: Local Notification Scheduling and Triggering
description: Verify local notifications for inventory alerts and scheduled reminders trigger reliably at correct times.

steps.description: Schedule a local notification setup for inventory reorder and invoice reminders.
Verify that notifications trigger on device at correct scheduled times.
Simulate real-time inventory changes causing immediate alerts.
Confirm instantaneous notification reception for critical inventories.

title: CSV Data Migration Integrity
description: Verify CSV import utility accurately migrates legacy invoice data without data loss and preserves audit trails.

steps.description: Import a well-formed CSV file containing legacy invoice data.
Verify invoices are created in the system with correct fields and status.
Verify audit trails and associated data relations are preserved.
Attempt importing a malformed or corrupted CSV file.
Verify error is reported and no partial data import occurs.

title: Firestore Data Isolation and Security Rules
description: Verify Firestore security rules enforce multi-tenancy by preventing cross-user data access.

steps.description: Attempt to query or modify invoices, customers, or inventory data belonging to another user.
Verify access is denied by Firestore security rules.
Perform allowed reads and writes on authenticated user's own data.
Verify operations succeed without error.

title: Data Operation Atomicity and Error Handling
description: Verify that invoice posting and stock updates are atomic and handle errors gracefully without exposing sensitive info.

steps.description: Simulate network disruption or Firestore failure during invoice posting.
Verify the operation rolls back any partial changes and shows user friendly error message.
Attempt concurrent updates on inventory data.
Confirm consistent data state with no race conditions or data corruption.

title: WhatsApp Payment Reminder Integration
description: Verify that payment reminder messages can be sent correctly to customers via WhatsApp integration.

steps.description: Select an unpaid invoice from customer profile.
Trigger the WhatsApp payment reminder action.
Verify that WhatsApp is opened or prompted with correct pre-filled payment reminder content.

title: User Session Auto Management
description: Verify that user sessions are managed automatically with auto-login on app restart and logout clears session.

steps.description: Log into the app successfully.
Close the app completely and reopen it.
Verify the user is auto-logged in and routed to Home Dashboard.
Perform a logout from the app.
Verify session is cleared and user is routed back to login screen.

title: Profile and Settings UI Consistency and Accessibility
description: Verify that profile and settings screens follow Material 3 theming, maintain consistent UI, and meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile and Settings screens.
Verify all UI elements match navy and sage palette and Material 3 guidelines.
Verify text sizes, contrast ratios, and touch targets meet accessibility guidelines.
Navigate using keyboard and screen readers.
Verify all interactive elements are accessible and navigable.
